bike.description: DEMO FSR frame. Super low center of gravity and standover with sub-seatstay actuated shock. Full cartridge bearing pivots, 9 of travel with full chainguide and front derailleur compatibility. 150mm wide 12 or 15mm thru-axle rear, ISCG mount, rear derailleur protector. 26 and 24 wheel compatible with two geometry settings, 16.7 chainstay length, forged and CNCd OS HT, Super ORE TT/DT.

components.description: Manitou Swinger 4-way, SPV position-sensitive damping, external adjustable pedal platform, progressivness and rebound. S:350 M:400 L:400 9.5 x 3
Marzocchi 888VF, 200mm travel, dual crown, HSCV damping, 20mm thru-axle
Cr-Mo, 1 1/8 threadless, all alloy and steel construction, loose ball bearing with seals
Integrated Marzocchi 888 for 31.8mm bar
Specialized Demo rise bar, 6066 butted alloy,31.8mm clamp, 6 degree upsweep, 9 degree backsweep, 670mm
Specialized MTB grip, black, double density Kraton
Hayes HFX-9 full hydraulic disc, 8 rotor
Hayes HFX-9 full hydraulic disc, 8 rotor
Hayes HFX-9 full hydraulic disc
Shimano M-570 LX, 34.9, bottom pull

24/36 4-bolt, compact 104/64mm pattern, Poly-G bash/rock guard

Specialized Stout disc 150mm wide 36h, 12mm thu-axle disc hub
